text: The cheetah is the fastest land animal
The lion is the king of the jungle
The tiger is the biggest cat
The baseball is a popular sport
Soccer is the most popular sport in the world
Basketball is a fun game to play
The elephant is the largest living land animal
Football is a sport played with a ball
The kangaroo is a marsupial
Tennis is a sport that requires a racket
The giraffe is the tallest animal
Golf is a sport played with clubs
The zebra is a striped animal
Rugby is a popular contact sport
The bear is a large mammal
Hockey is a fast paced sport
The monkey is a primate
Volleyball is a team sport
The hippopotamus is a large animal
Table tennis is a fun game to play
The cat chased its tail.
The bat flew around the room.
The dog barked at the mailman.
The horse galloped across the field.
The tiger roared in the jungle.
The football was kicked across the field.
The basketball was dribbled down the court.
The baseball was thrown across the diamond.
The soccer ball was kicked into the goal.
The hockey puck was shot into the net.
My cat loves to play with yarn.
My bat loves to eat insects.
My dog loves to chase sticks.
My horse loves to gallop around the pasture.
My tiger loves to stalk its prey.
My football team just won the championship.
My basketball team is in the playoffs.
My baseball team is in first place.
My soccer team is undefeated this season.
My hockey team is the defending champs.
The cat meowed softly.
The bat squeaked in the night.
The dog whined for attention.
The horse neighed in the stable.
